Title: Prohibits the purchase of single-use plastic bottles by the state and any governmental entity or political subdivision or public benefit corporation thereof
Summary: Prohibits the purchase of single-use plastic bottles by the state and any governmental entity or political subdivision or public benefit corporation thereof except for when required by health requirements, emergencies, or when no other alternative is available or practicable.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the purchase of single-use plastic bottles by the state and any governmental entity or political subdivision or public benefit corporation thereof
